main event: A circular object appeared as a solid with visible color structure. The object was yellow/white in color and was traveling in a northerly direction.
interesting points: The object appeared to have a visible color structure.
The object was moving in a northerly direction.
The object was observed by 3 witnesses.
The object was first observed as bright like a planet, then started flashing red, blue, and green lights.
The object was estimated to be observed for about 20-30 minutes.
sighted object: a circular object with visible color structure
